title: How to hide the "Down button" in Gboard, Pixel 3 XL
content:
I would simply like to know how to "hide" or disable the new arrow at the bottom of the Gboard, I am a Pixel 3 xl user.
I've already checked the configuration sections, both on screen and on the keyboard itself, and there is no option that allows me to do so.

Thanks in advance!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
